briefTitle: Reducing INfection at the Surgical SitE With Antibiotic Irrigation During Ventral Hernia Repair (RINSE Trial)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age \>18 y/o.
* Elective, open ventral hernia repair in a retromuscular fashion, with or without TAR.
* Clean, clean-contaminated, or contaminated wounds.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Age \<18 y/o.
* Pregnancy.
* Emergency hernia repair.
* Laparoscopic, robotic, or hybrid approach.
* Dirty wounds.
* Use of biologic or absorbable synthetic mesh.
* Onlay, intraperitoneal or preperitoneal mesh placement.

outcomeMeasures.title: Surgical Site Infection
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with Surgical Site Infections

outcomeMeasures.title: Incidence of SSI Requiring Intervention
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with SSI requiring reoperation or other procedural intervention at 30 days.
